name: Hologram Projector
description: Project a hologram that synchronously replays the Wanderer's attacks.
source: Summon a missile launcher for **8** seconds. **90**-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to **30%** of ATK.

advancement.description: Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Increase damage dealt by holograms to **50%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.
